Zoho Founder flags risk: US stocks in bubble; says gold is not an investment
description: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu views gold not as an investment but as insurance against systemic financial risk, especially with high debt levels eroding trust. This perspective follows IMF economist Gita Gopinath's warning of a potential $35 trillion global market crash due to record US equity exposure and unbalanced growth.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
description: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
description: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Auston Matthews’ Parents: Inside the Maple Leafs star’s family life
description: Auston Matthews' journey to NHL stardom is deeply rooted in the unwavering support of his parents, Brian and Ema Matthews. Ema, a former flight attendant with a pilot's dream, instilled discipline and humility, while Brian, a former baseball pitcher, guided his son's athletic development. Their dedication nurtured his talent from Scottsdale to international stages.

title: Carter Hart delivers strong message to Mitch Marner and the Golden Knights
description: Carter Hart is making an NHL comeback with the Vegas Golden Knights on a professional tryout contract. After a hiatus, the 27-year-old goaltender is eager to prove himself, having learned and grown from past experiences.  Vegas aims to bolster their goaltending with Hart, who will be eligible to play from December 1st, potentially debuting soon after.
